CE 4353 Design of Hydraulic Systems/CE 5360 Open Channel Hydraulics

Catalog Description

CE 4353: Design of Hydraulic Systems (3:3:0).. Design of open channel and closed-conduit conveyance systems for water; includes introduction to HEC-RAS. Prerequesites:
